DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether weekly paclitaxel follow weekly doxorubicin plus daily oral cyclophosphamide without granulocyte colony-stimulating factor ( G-CSF ) feasible treatment locally advance HER2-negative breast cancer .
